content: i counted seven either side of the center stitch center stitch working into the 8th 11th slip stitches ➢ using the ends of the strap attach to the sole using the slip stiches as a guide i found the strap for me was four slip stitches in width 13 making the heel work this for both soles find the center stitches of the heel and count 8 stitches either side row 1 starting on the right side join yarn with a chain 1 and single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in each of the next 17 st turn 18 st row 2 single_crochet in the same stitch and in each st around turn 18 st row 3 chain 3 make 8 stars using the star stitch across half_double_crochet in last st turn 8 stars + 1 half_double_crochet make this first star like the strap using the chain stitches and base of the first st row 4 chain 1 skip next st 2sc into the eye of each star around single_crochet into the top of the chain 3 from beginning of the row 18 st turn row 5 chain 1 single_crochet in each st 18 st you will have created the ankle section it should measure approx 1 for a taller heel repeat row 5 until desired height making the heel strap right foot for the right foot we will continue without ending off we will work a foundation double_crochet fdc stitch to make the strap 1 yarn over and insert hook into the eye of the last star yarn over and draw through 3 loops on hook 2 yarn over draw through one loop yarn over draw through two loops yarn over draw through the last two loops your first fdc is complete 3 work 8 fdc stitches 9 fdc 4 chain 4 and slip_stitch into the base of the last fdc to make a loop for the button end off if you have a larger button work an extra chain to make the loop bigger 14 making the heel strap left foot for the left shoe end off after row 5 of the making the heel section of the pattern this strap is made separately 1 chain 4 make your first foundation double_crochet fdc make another 8 fdc leaving a tail long enough to sew to the heel of the shoe 9 fdc 2 attach the strap to the right side of the heel with a slip_stitch into the top of the single_crochet from row 5 use a yarn needle to attach the bottom of the strap to the side of the heel 3 the side that has the chain 4 in the first fdc will become the button hole for securing the button to the opposite side attach a decorative button to both shoes and you are done enjoy your sandals 15 method 9-12 months
